spatial_accuracy.notes: Excellent room adjacency and wall alignment. Door swings are generally accurate, although the bedroom 2 door is slightly misplaced relative to the hall corner. Window placements match the rhythm of the floor plan accurately.

structural_fidelity.notes: All rooms are present with no structural reinterpretations. Roof is correctly removed, background is dark neutral, and there are no text labels or UI overlays.

furniture_mapping.notes: Furniture mapping is highly accurate, including kitchen appliances, laundry machines, and specific bathroom fixtures like the corner tub. Minor deduction for the orientation of the desk in Bedroom 2 which differs slightly from the plan's icon.

aesthetic_quality.notes: Perfect low-poly execution with flat shading. The camera is correctly set to an orthographic isometric view. Lighting is clean and non-dramatic as requested.

detected_errors.description: Bedroom 2 door is placed further east along the hallway wall than indicated in the original 2D plan.
The desk/workspace in Bedroom 2 is rotated 90 degrees compared to the layout shown in the floor plan.
